title: The Raw Place - Al Muneera
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Western, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out
description: This outlet is at Al Muneera Beach Plaza. Offers grab n go cold-pressed juices, smoothies, cold-brew coffee plus chia bowls, raw food and desserts.
streetAddress: Al Muneera Beach Plaza, Al Raha Blvd, Al Raha Beach
